means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 斯坦丁 Standen的变体

sentence.Network_en: Mack seemed to uncoil slowly up into a standing position.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦克慢慢直起身站了起来。

sentence.Network_en: She was standing by a pool, about to dive in.
sentence.Network_cn: 她站在水池旁边，正要往里跳。

sentence.Network_en: There has been some misunder-standing of our publishing aims.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于我们的出版目的存在着某些误解。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 站立式(Standing)益处：腿部肌肉、二头肌、三头肌　　辅导：这的确对身体素质要求高了点，但优点是随时随地享受激情。
z my leader is standing nearby ., 我的上司站在附近.
英语试题（2008-3-6） - 水晶瓶的日志 - 网易博客 ... A. stationary 不动的 B. standing 直立的 C. stable 牢固的.
Nov.11信用证翻译 - guangming的日志 - 网易博客 ... 18. transaction 交易 19. standing 身份，地位 20. default 违约.

list.abs: 中国特色词的译法 - Billwang 工业设计论坛 ... director 理事 standing director 常务理事 secretary general 秘书长.
大学英语四级常用词组 ... stand by 站在旁边；袖手旁观 stand for 代替；代表；意味着 stand in one's way 阻碍，妨碍.
高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... Athens n 雅典（希腊首都） stand for 代表；代替；象征；支持 continent n 大陆； 陆地.
介词短语_百度百科 ... speed up 使加速 stand out 突出，显眼 stand up 站起来，耐用.
新概念英语单词表带音标（第一册） - 豆丁网 ... back 背 stand up 起立，站起来 help 帮助.
介词短语_百度百科 ... stand out 突出，显眼 stand up 站起来，耐用 step up 提高，加快，加紧.

jx.jx_en_mean: (Sailing)(chiefly with reference to a boat's stopping) without time to lower the sails
jx.jx_cn_mean: (航海)（主要指船的停泊）没有时间落帆的

jx.jx_en_mean: in favour or on good terms with someone
jx.jx_cn_mean: 受某人欢迎；与某人关系好

lj.lj_ly: the companies wanted to stay in good standing with the government.
lj.lj_ls: 那些公司想与政府保持良好的关系。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)be much better or make much faster progress than someone or something else
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)比…好得多；比…进步快得多

lj.lj_ly: in the personal fitness stakes he left her standing.
lj.lj_ls: 就个人健康方面而言，他比她好得多。

entry.def: Someone's standing is their reputation or status.

example.tran: 具有国际名望的艺术家

example.ex: He has improved his country's standing abroad...
example.tran: 他提高了自己国家的国际声望。

entry.tran: (党派或个人的)受欢迎程度，支持率
entry.def: A party's or person's standing is their popularity.

example.ex: But, as the opinion poll shows, the party's standing with the people at large has never been so low...
example.tran: 但是民意调查显示，该党在公众中的支持率从未这么低过。

example.ex: Mrs Thatcher's standing was much higher in the US than at home.
example.tran: 撒切尔夫人在美国要比在本国更受欢迎。

entry.def: You use standing to describe something which is permanently in existence.

example.ex: Israel has a relatively small standing army and its strength is based on its reserves...
example.tran: 以色列的常备军规模相对较小，其军事实力主要在于它的预备役部队。

example.ex: Elizabeth had a standing invitation to stay with her.
example.tran: 伊丽莎白受到邀请，可以随时去她家住。

entry.def: In a contest or competition, the list of competitors which shows their places during the event is called the standings .

example.ex: Britain is 11th in the team standings.
example.tran: 英国在各队排名中位列第 11 位。

entry.def: You can use the expression of many years' standing to say that something has had a particular function or someone has had a particular role for many years. For example, if a place is your home of ten years' standing, it has been your home for ten years.

example.tran: 有 24 年资历的国会议员

example.ex: My girlfriend of long standing left me.
example.tran: 我多年的女朋友离开了我。

means.word_mean: 1. social or financial or professional status or reputation;
2. the act of assuming or maintaining an erect upright position
3. not created for a particular occasion;
5. executed in or initiated from a standing position;
6. (of persons) on the feet; having the torso in an erect position supported by straight legs;

auth_sentence.content: You are usually standing with a crowd of people.
auth_sentence.res_content: You are usually standing with a crowd of people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You are usually standing with a crowd of people.

auth_sentence.content: Measure your waist-hip ratio while standing relaxed and naked.
auth_sentence.res_content: Measure your waist-hip ratio while standing relaxed and naked.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Measure your waist-hip ratio while standing relaxed and naked.

auth_sentence.content: The sauce will thicken up a bit on standing.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sauce will thicken up a bit on standing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sauce will thicken up a bit on standing.

stems_affixes.word_buile: stagn=stan站,立+ant……的→站着不走,停滞的
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的
stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+fast→稳固的
dis分开+stance=stan站,立→分开站着→有距离→距离
equi平等+distance[n.距离, 远离]→n.等距离
home家+stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]→站再家里的→处在家的→家园,家宅
in内+stan站,立+ce→站在里面的东西,表示就在面前→例子
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stems_affixes.word_buile: stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+ing状态→n.站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+point点→n.立场, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物质;实质,本质;主旨;财产,资产
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+stance=stan站,立→放在下面之物
stan站,立+d→v.站, 立, 站起

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使符合标准, 使标准化
stems_affixes.word_buile: standard[n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的]+ize表动词→v.使符合标准, 使标准化

Sentence.sentence: You are standing up all the time.
Once, at a drug store, I was looking around and found a guy standing on a large box, stocking the shelves.

means.word_mean: 直立的,站着的,站着进行的

sentences.en: After the earthquake only a few houses were left standing.
sentences.cn: 地震过后只有几幢房屋还立着 。

sentences.en: I never learned the trick of standing on my head.
sentences.cn: 我没有学过头着地倒立的技艺。

sentences.en: I kept standing in the scorching sun for a long time,till I fainted.
sentences.cn: 我一直长时间地站在灼热的太阳下,终于昏倒了。

means.word_mean: 名望；身份；地位；级别；名声

sentences.en: a knight in good standing with the king
her low standing among her fellow scientists
sentences.cn: 她在同行科学家中较低的声望

sentences.en: his international standing in cancer research
sentences.cn: 他在癌症研究领域的国际声誉

sentences.en: His standing as a film director has risen in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近几年来他作为电影导演的名声渐响。
